org.relationlearn.model

Interface ArgumentNode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeImpl

    public interface ArgumentNode
    The ArgumentNode interface represents a text message in a given message board with additional parameters to help it being identified from other messages in a RelationDigraph instace.
    See Also:
    RelationDigraph, ArgumentRelation

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addReplyRelation(ArgumentRelation relation)
      Adds a new ArgumentRelation in which this node acts as the destination.
      void addTargetRelation(ArgumentRelation aRel)
      Adds an ArgumentRelation which represents the reply this node made to antoher ArgumentNode.
      String getArgumentNodeText()
      Returns the text that this node contains.
      int getNodeId()
      Returns the ArgumentNode identifier.
      int getNodeWeight()
      Returns the weight value of this ArgumentNode.
      ArgumentRelation getReplayRelation(int relationId)
      Returns the ArgumentRelation with id relationId in which this node is the destination.
      List<ArgumentRelation> getReplyRelations()
      Returns a List of all the ArgumentRelation objects in which this node acts as the destination.
      ArgumentRelation getTargetRelation()
      Returns the ArgumentRelation in which this node is the origin.

    • Method Detail

      • getNodeId

        int getNodeId()
        Returns the ArgumentNode identifier.
        Returns:
        this ArgumentNode identifier

      • getNodeWeight

        int getNodeWeight()
        Returns the weight value of this ArgumentNode.

        Note: Negative weight values should be permited by ArgumentNode implementations.

        Returns:
        the weight of this ArgumentNode

      • addTargetRelation

        void addTargetRelation(ArgumentRelation aRel)
        Adds an ArgumentRelation which represents the reply this node made to antoher ArgumentNode.
        Parameters:
        aRel - the ArgumentRelation that contains this node as origin and another ArgumentNode as destination.

      • getTargetRelation

        ArgumentRelation getTargetRelation()
        Returns the ArgumentRelation in which this node is the origin.
        Returns:
        the ArgumentRelation that has its source in this ArgumentNode object.
        See Also:
        ArgumentRelation

      • getReplayRelation

        ArgumentRelation getReplayRelation(int relationId)
        Returns the ArgumentRelation with id relationId in which this node is the destination.
        Parameters:
        relationId - the id of the ArgumentRelation
        Returns:
        the ArgumentRelation in which this node acts as the destination.

      • getReplyRelations

        List<ArgumentRelation> getReplyRelations()
        Returns a List of all the ArgumentRelation objects in which this node acts as the destination.
        Returns:
        a list containing all the ArgumentRelations in which this node is the destination.

      • addReplyRelation

        void addReplyRelation(ArgumentRelation relation)
        Adds a new ArgumentRelation in which this node acts as the destination.
        Parameters:
        relation - the ArgumentRelation to be added
        See Also:
        ArgumentRelation

      • getArgumentNodeText

        String getArgumentNodeText()
        Returns the text that this node contains.
        Returns:
        the text this node contains
